Reviews.Title: “Horrible Place”
Reviews.Author: parker13
Reviews.Content: Trust me when I tell you the place had no good qualities. It's hard to use the word hospitality when describing this business. The place is in need of total renovation from rooms to staff.

Reviews.Title: “I am sickened by the Knights Inn hotel chain!”
Reviews.Author: mndarnell
Reviews.Content: The Motel 6 is by far superior to the Knights Inn! I came to this hotel with my 3 children. I have been here in the past and have had no problems with the accommodations. We stayed right after Christmas time and the rates were jacked up to where it was unbelievable, it cost over $140.00 to stay at a hotel with no ash tray in the smoking room, a broken ice machine, dirty linens, a broken toilet, no internet access, and no phone for the room for 2 nights. When I needed towels I was told by the manager to get the towels myself. After this I reported the hotel to the national chain and I was told by an "internet specialist" that the manager of the hotel would be in contact with me within 2 weeks. Here is the exact transcript of the email: Dear Customer, Thank you for taking the time to bring your concern to our attention and allowing us the opportunity to address your needs. We are sincerely sorry to hear we did not provide you with an excellent Knights Inn experience. You can count on our team to help resolve your concerns. To assist you in reaching a resolution, I've informed the Knights Inn Orlando East's general manager of the situation. The general manager will contact you by 1/25. As a company, we're committed to delivering a great experience every time you stay with us, and I sincerely apologize this did not happen in this case. Please know that we truly appreciate your feedback and the opportunity to respond to your concerns. I replied: I appreciate your effort to give each of your guests a pleasant experience at the Knights Inn, but feel very uncomfortable speaking to the man who rented me the room & do not wish to have any confrontation, as the gentleman was polite, but clearly didn't have the resources to carry the Knights Inn name. In the future, I will research reviews. I tend to trust chain hotel/motels. I've never stayed in a chain motel in this disarray. It would be best practices if Knights Inn administration dealt w/ their own managers and staff. I am a guest and do not feel it is my place to get involved via telephone w/ the motel mgr and want no hard feelings. I know that the economy is in shambles, I only expected that a brand name motel have a minimal/moderate standards. Thank you for your prompt response & the best of luck w/ cleaning up the Kissimmee Knights Inn for tourists to stay. It was clearly a residential motel and Not suitable for a family visiting Disney. I hope this helps. Reply from a different "internet specialist": I am so sorry to hear about what you have encountered with the hotel, but we must allow the hotel the business days to resolve this with you. Please allow the manager until 1/24/12 to resolve the issue. I will watch your case and if you have not been contacted by 1/24/12, we will contact you. So after a ridiculous game of back and forth, the hotel chain insists that I have a confrontation with the manager! Why would I want to speak with the manager after this stay? He knows how I was treated, he treated me this way, and why would I want to stay at this hotel again? I'm more disgusted with the way that the Knights Inn hotel chain reacted to the situation than even the disgusting hotel itself. I will never stay at any Knights Inn chain motel again. When there are so many companies going bankrupt, Knights Inn should really rethink their customer service policies.

Reviews.Title: “its not a motel its a pig houses (sorry pigs)”
Reviews.Author: Adi A
Reviews.Content: Dont understand how this place got the license to operate like a motel please remve it from any category of accomodation...DISGUSTING..and this is without even speaking about the grumpy bad disgusting thieve rude old woman in the front...we pay for a room at 2AM in the morning was worst than anything i can discribe then we went to look at the room and we deside we couldn't breath there we asked to leave and to get the money back- the old woman in the front desk refused and said that we stayed too long there ( around 30 minutes- can u believe that ?) so we didnt get our money back and we had to leave THE PLACE IS A DISASTER, DANGEROUS FOR YOUR HEALTH, BE CREFULL, PAY FEW BACKS MORE AND SAVE YOURSELF A LOT OF TROUBLE...SOMEBODY MUST DO SOMETHING ABOUT THIS LOCATION AND ABOUT THE OLD WOMAN IN THE FRONT DESK.

Reviews.Title: “Seriously Believe The Reviews - Very Bad”
Reviews.Author: PeopleMoverMan
Reviews.Content: I tend to be a bit optimistic when it comes to Hotel and Lodging Reviews. However, each review about this Motel hit it right on the head. This place is horrible, scary and should be reported and condemned. I like to give the benefit of the doubt for the bad reviews but there is no way around the bad quality of these accommodations. We planned to come down to Orlando for a short get-away trip and needed some casual lodging for 3 days. When we arrived at 2:00 a.m. we had a easy check in and even the service was nice but upon stepping into our room it was like stepping into something like a third world country. The walls were smeared with black dirt or smudge. The floors smelled of mold and dust. The bedspreads on the double beds were dirty and old. The furniture looked old and broken. The bathroom smelled because of poop still left in the toilet and mold in the shower. We didn't even request anything we immediately booked another room at a Howard Johnson down the road. We weren't even there 20 mins, even with the hotel trying to show us 4 other rooms. We were gone. This room was actually scary, something out of a horror film and that isn't an exaggeration. Please, Please reconsider any decision to stay here. There are plenty of other motels on Irlo Bronson at the same or similar price that are more acceptable accommodations. I didn't even care that I didn't even get my money back. God only knows what I would have seen if I had even pulled back the bedspread.

Reviews.Title: “OK, if you just need a place to sleep”
Reviews.Author: Panthers82
Reviews.Content: Knights Inn is okay if you are just looking for a place to sleep. The rooms were old, as was everything in it, but it served the purpose of having somewhere to sleep while we were at amusement parks all week. Got really tired of "Antonio's Pizza" putting papers between the door all week. Don't think we'd ever stay there again

Reviews.Title: “NEVER, NEVER GO TO THIS MOTEL”
Reviews.Author: Inman726
Reviews.Content: Our Room was very dirty. There was hair and dirt all around the bathrooms basebord. When we arrived there was 1/2 a roll of toliet paper. We requested more. It never came. There were four of us and only two towels, We reguested more and the maid said all the towels were dirty and she would bring more as soon as they were clean. She did later after we already showered and dressed (all 4 of us). All of our sheet in our non-smoking room were burn through with cigrette holes, VERY NASTY. The hotel says Cont. Breakfest....That was a LIE!!! Nothing??? We have traveled to 26 Hotels/ Motels in the year 2010 and this was the very worse one ever... We couldnt leave, No refund and already paid in advanced online. Really Crappy. Pleas be smart and STAY AWAY from that place.

Reviews.Title: “pls avoid this place”
Reviews.Author: smat2008
Reviews.Content: We booked this place as it was reasonably priced and looked fine in the pictures. But we paid the price once we reached there. We had booked two rooms. But the guy at the front desk told us that he has just one room available and someone else had called up and canceled one of our reservations. So four of us had to stay in one room. The room was clean though, but very old furniture and equipments. We moved to a different hotel the next day.

Reviews.Title: “Knights Inn Orlando Maingate East Hotel made for insects”
Reviews.Author: Truth20
Reviews.Content: This the worst hotel in whole world, Am not kidding.It smells .There old smelly furnitures.Cockroach in our room.The reception is very bad.The onwner is manager from hell.

Reviews.Title: “NEVER EVER GO HERE”
Reviews.Author: befo
Reviews.Content: We were traveling from Norway to Florida for a 2 week vacation. I traveled with my 3 year old, my mum, my sister and a friend. We wanted to go to Disney World so I made a reservation for 3 nights at this motel online. It looked ok but I thought it was low priced, but many motels in this area are. We arrived late at night after driving from Key West. When we checked in at the front desk I already knew this place was no good. It smelled horrible. We had booked two non-smoking rooms. The rooms we got were awful. The smell of smoke was intens. The carpet was the worst I have ever seen. Blood stains and things I don´t want to think about. Smashed bugs on the walls, doors, furniture. Hardly any lights worked. In the bathroom the floor had cracked open from the bath tub so it was a big open crack between the floor and tub. God knows what crawls in there at night....! I went to front desk to get new rooms but she could only give me one new room. It was also the same but only without the crack in the bathroom floor. It was late and we did not want to go and look for a new place to stay. We stayed for one night. I could not sleep at all. Outside of the motel someone had left their smashed car, no outside light worked, strange people walked around. I did not feel safe there at all. I did not care to argue to get our money back. I just told the lady at the front desk what kind of a dump this was and left. This motel belongs in a horror movie. The only thing missing was Freddy Krùger and Jason...... I have been traveling a lot in US and this is by far the worst place I have ever stayed in. Even worse than the Carter Hotel in New York City!!!!! Don´t even think about going to this Knights Inn. It is just disgusting!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “the hotel in hostel would be a better choice”
Reviews.Author: bigdaddyjimc
Reviews.Content: hotel was dirty and when checked in was told our we needed to pay 42 dollars extra for room to cover the free breakfast,wifi, and shuttle our room was already paid for through airline and was told we need to pay the extra or we lose our room with no refund whe got to room it was dirty and had no towles next day came back when maid was cleaning room with her 4 kids one was playing my kids nintendo ds two were trying to get my laptop to work and one was jumping on bed we complained to front desk cleark told us her kids would never do that we were mistakein about that . break fast was a bag of mini doughnuts and half gallon jug of oj ,the disney shuttle leaves at 7am but the park opens at 9am it picks up at park at 4 its the only shuttle times availeable and the wifi only works in lobby this was the worst hotel i have ever stayed at

Reviews.Title: “Terrible Experience”
Reviews.Author: alcaptain
Reviews.Content: This place is the worst hotel we have ever stayed. We had to change rooms several times. The rooms are smelly, smells old and smells like sewer. The walls are messy and not sound proof. We could easily hear the conversations between the guests next door and actually heard them making love-horrible. One night my husband got up and saw roaches as big and as fast as a 747 aircraft flying around. Another night, my husband got up when he heard voices, he got his flashlight and he saw the roaches with M16 and bullet proof vest giving orders to attack. Same your self time and spend the extra $10 or so somewhere else, even next door to Best Western

Reviews.Title: “The "Vacancy" Motel”
Reviews.Author: Moody1964
Reviews.Content: The only thing missing was the VCR. We had to switch rooms 3 times, the 1st one had a horrible smell, the 2nd one, the toilet and the bathtub were clogged, and the 3rd one was missing a drawer and the a/c took forever to cool. I also compared it to the Bates Motel, the only thing missing was Norman Bates and his mother. Stay away!!!!

Reviews.Title: “BAD!!!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: BeachSunlover
Reviews.Content: We spent one night there, were told we had wireless internet service, NOT. The room smelled very old of mold and mildew. I have terrible allergies, mold being a top one. Brown stuff smeared on the bathroom wall. This place needs a total overhaul. NO SMOKE ALARM, I thought they were required by law. She "only charged $32 but it wasn't worth $2. Horrible place. I wish I had taken pictures.

Reviews.Title: “F- Never again and I'm cheap!”
Reviews.Author: RoughWaterMarine
Reviews.Content: WyndhamRewards.com is great but one has to know what to look for in the photographs such as low beds = bad and high beds = good. Even with things like that, this property is as bad as the other review state and worse. It's not a crap shoot; it's BAD! Don't stay here!

Reviews.Title: “Horrible! Bugs and mice!”
Reviews.Author: ashbug21
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for business and the first room was dirty and had a hole in the wall where mice came in and out. Another person on our trip had a hole in the floor and roaches in the bathroom. We changed rooms and the florr was caved in by the bathroom and you would almost fall if you were not careful. VERY GROSS!! NEVER STAY HERE!!

Reviews.Title: “wonderful stay”
Reviews.Author: conchii
Reviews.Content: We went to this hostel in December and it was a really nice experience. Disney World is very close and there are free shuttle bus to there. The staff was friendly and they were always dispossed to help us. The bedroom is big and very clean and they have fridge and microwave. There is a supermarket very close and a lot of store. We have been here for four nights but we are looking forward to come back next year.

Reviews.Title: “Bugs Inn Maingate East”
Reviews.Author: johnn_dc
Reviews.Content: The most horrible and disgusting hotel ever..My family and I had been to budget hotels in New York, Barcelona, China but we had never experienced such worst thing like this, and I cannot comprehend why the City of Kissimmee still allows this bug-infested hotel to operate in such tourist area as Irlo Bronson hi-way. I booked two nights through online, and at the middle of our first night we attempted to leave because of filthy smell like molds in the room and the presence of crawling cockroaches and bugs in our not so clean bedspread seems never ending. An electrical outlet was just left open and busted at the back of the TV and rusted fridge for an additional $3, a disconnected telephone and rusted hangers plus a yellowish toilet bowl full of floating dead bugs. We stayed for that night when the manager/owner of Indian descent convinced us to move to what he said "much better newer room". Well the new room seems to be less smelly but at the middle of the night, bugs slowly crawling in our bedsheets. We decided to moved out the next morning at Best western and pay little more, with an argument from the owner that we cannot expect a five-star hotel accommodation for $40 night, so stupid reasoning. Well, I said we know that, but at least cleanliness and hygiene are evry important even for such budget hotels. This hotel deserved to be shut down by authorities in Kissimmee, and Hotels.com and other website should STOP advertising this inhabitable Knights Inn Hotel..If you want to ruin your vacation..You can Book in this hotel!

Reviews.Title: “Worst hotel ever!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: modina_a
Reviews.Content: My family and my Best friends family booked two rooms at this hotel six months in advance over the phone, we called to make the reservation because my friend used her credit card to book the room, but didnt want anything cvharged to that card, and her plane was arriving after the checkin time so we wanted my name added so i could check into he rooms when I arrived before picking her up at the airport. When I arrived i had to argue with the front desk to be able to check in even though my name was on the reservations. But finally got it streaightened out. My friends room was ok, fairly clean....but could use some touch ups. my room, which was right next to it was disgusting! I had to call to have them re-clean the bathroom, but it did no good. There was still wads of old soap boxes and mold all over the tub, i clean for a living so i admit i am knit picky about cleaning! But this was just rediculous! We paid for a cheap hotel, but clean would have been nice and was sort of expected, this hotel needs to be shut down for health code violations! The rooms were kept very dark with low watt light bulbs and dark light covers, in my opinion this is done so that the guests dont notice exactly how nasty the rooms are. Our bed was missing sheets and it took two days to get them from the front desk and asking four times. Our bathroom door wouldnt close, which was kindof necessary. To top off the crappy customer service upon check-in and the nasty room we were charged for the rooms more than once, which put a hold on our spending money. The managers or owners, whichever they were, told us it was our fault and would do nothing to make this better. We had to have the bank fix it and block any charges from the hotel, they were very rude and disrespectful. An "I'm sorry this happened" would have been nice but all we got was rude comments and blamed for them charging us again, how it was our fault i still dont understand! We would have changed hotels if we hadnt have been so busy and if we werent affraid of being charged yet again for the horrible rooms!

Reviews.Title: “No Bathroom Door!!!!”
Reviews.Author: dragonjulie
Reviews.Content: The hotel was the usual orlando budget hotel. This is what I booked and what I expected. The only thing I was very disappointed with was the lack of bathroom door. Okay let me explain this, from the main room there was a door to a small vanity area which contained the sink and then from there a doorway (without the door) to the bathroom which contained the toilet and bath. It was impossible for someone to use the toilet or bath without someone who was washing at the sink being able to see. There was also no lock on the door to the vanity area. This lack of privacy was unacceptable to me. I will not be staying here again.

Reviews.Title: “Don't Do It”
Reviews.Author: superman1974
Reviews.Content: This was hand's down the worst hotel I have ever seen. My husband and I walked in and I could not believe what I saw. The bed wasn't made, the room had a horrible musty smell. I half expected to see a chalk line on the floor. Our "Neighbor" had tomato plants lined up between our rooms on the sidewalk. We immediately walked out and checked into the Best Western next door. I would not recommend this hotel to my worst enemy. Please take my advise and don't make a reservation at this hotel and don't trust Priceline! I won't again!

Reviews.Title: “I was warned....”
Reviews.Author: ugadawgs98
Reviews.Content: Well...I booked through Priceline and was looking for a cheap overnighter while traveling to Miami. I read the reviews after they released the reservation to me and thought "it can't be that bad". I was only looking for a basic clean place to sleep overnight and was not expecting any extras. After all....Priceline is a reputable site and I ASSUMED all would be well. I was wrong. When I opened the door I was hit with a strong musty smell that made my eyes water. I found my room was still in its original 70's condition. The furniture, faucets, lighting and bedspread all appeared to be original. The walls in the room were three different colors...red, gold and tan. It was hot so I decided to turn up the AC....I quickly found it was up. It was hotter in the room than it was outside(75 in Feb). The carpet had been replaced at some point by some horrible installers. They did not install it under the baseboard and just cut it to size. I could literally go to a corner and pull it up exposing the floor. The lighting was horrible. The fluorescent light in the bathroom did not work. You had to turn the light on over the sink and leave the door open. The lamp by the TV did not work and the light over the table gave off a weird yellow tint. The whole room just made you not want to touch anything. All in all...it was a disaster. If I had booked more than one night I would have packed up and left eating the monetary loss. Do not stay here...no matter the price.

Reviews.Title: “"Condemned" should be written across the hotel”
Reviews.Author: hiflyphil
Reviews.Content: Room 1, the floor had collapsed in the bathroom, extremely dangerous to anyone who dared walk on it. Room 2, the ceiling had received obvious cover up's in the past, and that night during a rain storm, it collapsed on to us while we were asleep in bed. The room was dank and mouldy for these reasons. Room 3, could not even open the door, when finally let in by the caretaker we took a good look around, looked at each other and decided to check out.

Reviews.Title: “Room 170 still not fixed”
Reviews.Author: flexonguy
Reviews.Content: Worst room, I have every stayed in......room #170 still not fixed...mold and smelly! Nothing special about breakfast....spent more and stay somewhere else..

Reviews.Title: “Cheap”
Reviews.Author: skidivetravel
Reviews.Content: I booked one night in a "king, non-smoking". We were assigned to room #170. It had a comfortable king bed with clean sheets, frig, microwave, two-burner stove, and a safe. Sound like a good value? NO! As soon as we opened the door, we were hit by the smell of mold. There was a leak under the bathroom sink that created a puddle in front of the vanity. The water then ran under the floor where it supported a healthy growth of mold. I could see the mold through a gap between the bathtub and the flooring.

Reviews.Title: “Clean and Cheap”
Reviews.Author: TravelerS17
Reviews.Content: Clean room. Hot shower. Other guests were quiet families. Inexpensive price. If you intend to spend time in your room, choose someplace else. The place is run down and not much in the looks department. If you need a clean, inexpensive place to sleep, this is good. Great, great location. Nice Perkins restaurant adjacent. Comfortable pool area. Not a single bug. Fridge and microwave in room. Free shuttle to Disney. Catching the free shuttle return from Epcot is disorganized, but hey, it's free.

Reviews.Title: “Horrible!!”
Reviews.Author: Ali06
Reviews.Content: when we arrived the large trash can outside of our room was overflowing with trash and empty beer bottles. They had to be asked over and over again to empty the trash can. Dead bugs were on the bathroom countertop. Bugs as large as my index finger were crawling on the walls and curtains. Dirt was visible on the base of the bathtub and sink. The dresser was dirty also. A knob was missing from the bathtub faucet. My friends went out and bought cleaning supplies and cleaned their rooms as best they could. Our rooms were booked for 7/15/07-7/22/07. I just could not bear one more night in that room. I left after the first night and checked into the Best Western Kissimmee Inn. For the remainder of my stay.

Reviews.Title: “Cheap”
Reviews.Author: TravelGoddest
Reviews.Content: I stayed in this hotel because of it's location. It wasn't anything special but it was clean, the room was bigger then I expected and had a fridge and a microwave. This property is off Irlo Bronson which can be very congested so it was nice to be near this busy road but off this road. I thought the staff was nice. I used this room just as a place to sleep watch tv and shower during my travels. If you are looking for a place just to sleep this place was worth the price.

Reviews.Title: “Not The best but...”
Reviews.Author: Ajiseco
Reviews.Content: This place is really old. I vicited several times in the las 4 years, but thing are not getting better. I think it needs new management. I discovered a website for this hotel: [--]

Reviews.Title: “AWEFUL and DISGUSTING”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: From the moment we went to check in there were problems. The receptionist told us that our room was ready and sent us on our way. We walked up to the room and the door was wide open. The mattresses were off of the beds and the sheets were laying on the floor. In the sink we found lots of vomit. We went back to the front desk and told the receptionist. After giving the hotel more than an hour to clean our room we went back and it was still a mess. The floor was not vacuumed, there was a whole in the bottom of the door, the sink still had vomit in it, and the bedsheets had not been changed. (I flipped them back and found hair and bodily fluids on them.) Lets just say that as soon as I saw this, we packed up our things and went to a different hotel. The hotel grounds are a mess. It looks as if people are living long-term in the hotel. The pool is disgusting and looked as if it was not cleaned within months. The hotel staff is rude and does not care about its guests. If you come across this hotel and are interested because it is inexpensive, think about your safety and how much you are willing to sacrifice to save a few dollars.

Reviews.Title: “Disney on a Budget + Hurricane Charley”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: We had quite the experience at the Knights Inn. We took two adjoining rooms here during our stay in Orlando in August 2004. Was this hotel great? No, the room was clean but was sparsely furnished, the beds were passable and the service was eh... However, for the amount spent I have trouble complaining. The hotel is 10 minutes for Disney and the parking spot right outside the room is a huge time saver. Yes the breakfast was simple, but it's breakfast and a simpler meal means a shorter meal which means earlier arrival at the park (which avoids tons of lines). While we stayed at this motel Hurricane Charley struck. This hurricane knocked the power out of one of the rooms and not the other which was strange but the building held up and we were at SeaWorld the next day! If you believe your trip to Orlando is about riding rides and enjoying the attractions this hotel is not a bad choice, easy to get in, easy to get out. If you don't subscribe to the all hotels look the same when the lights are off theory and are picky about your accommodations, you may want to look elsewhere. We will be staying here again this summer.

Reviews.Title: “hated the Knights Inn Maingate East”
Reviews.Author: Negron
Reviews.Content: July 8, 2006 I planned my 4th of July Vacation around the Orlando area. I booked a reservation at Knights Inn Maingate East in Kissimmee. When I got there, it was not at all what I expected. The conditions at the hotel were totally unacceptable. Upon checking in, my reservation was booked for a smoking room when in fact, I booked it for a non-smoking. The clerk then proceeded to book me in a another room. Upon entering the room, the floor was sinking, exposing a hole along the wall where the floor was suppossed to connect to the wall. Upon further inspection, I noticed that the carpeting was filthy and it also was water soaked possibly due to a bathroom leak. This caused a moldy odor in the room. Also, the bed sheets were stained and the air conditioning unit was totally falling apart. As tired as I was, I decided to spend the night and try to make the best of the situation. The following morning, I left bright and early to attend one of the theme parks. Upon returning later that evening, I noticed that the sheets had been changed once again with stained linens. And this time there was a very strong odor of what seemed like cat urine that overcame the entire room. The odor was so strong that It made me sick to my stomache. I finally went to the front desk and told them about the entire situation. The clerk told me that the only thing he could do would be to book me in a smoking room. I decided that I could not possibly spent the rest of my vacation in this place. And so, that evening at approximately 2:00 AM, I checked out of the Knights Inn and set out to find a hotel with acceptable accomodations.

Reviews.Title: “Yuck!”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: The floors were coming apart, the room stunk, there was water damage, the ceiling was seperating from the wall, the tub was backed up, the toilet leaked, the pool was dirty, and there was snot stuck to the wall. My advice is to spend some more money and stay some where else.

Reviews.Title: “Disgusting! Horrible place to stay!!!!”
Reviews.Author: ttraniello
Reviews.Content: This was by far the worst place we have ever stayed! The bathroom floor was caving in, the bathroom door did not shut, there was no trash can in the room, the beds did not stay on the box springs. Worst of all it stunk of bug killer!!! What you see on the photos is not what you get!!!! It ruined our trip!!! Gives a new meaning to the words "roach coach motel!"

Reviews.Title: “No Customer Service”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: Booking a combo Flight and Hotel Deal, you get what you pay for. Flying across country and coming to a place that you have never been before can be scary. Then to come to a hotel after midnight that rents by the hour is even scarier. The clerk at this hotel was rude and refused to accommandate, forcing 5 people who had reservations to another hotel. I do not recommend this hotel to anyone with children or the desire to have a clean place to stay.

Reviews.Title: “attentavie staff”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: Great Location for everything. Easy Access to old town. In the room we had requested 2 doubble beds and instead of that got a queen size bed.The bathromm tile was loose. Our air condition also gave out and when we called for Maintance Claudia had sent them quickly.Claudia was verry nice and extreemly helpful. Claudia was also the one that we made our reservation with. If you can i would reccomend that you try to get into the clarion suites resort world or star island as those are awsome resorts along with the ramada.

HotelInfo.Name: Knights Inn Orlando East
HotelInfo.Address: 2880 North Poinciana Boulevard, Kissimmee, FL 34746
